Quests.Name: go_to_island
Quests.Title: Go To The Mysterious Island
Quests.Description: You received an anonymous letter in the mail telling you to go to an island.
Quests.Objective: Take the boat to go to the island.

Quests.Name: talk_to_sten
Quests.Title: Talk to the Owner
Quests.Description: Now that you have arrived on the mystery island, you should probably find whoever owns this place.
Quests.Objective: Talk to the owner of the island
Quests.ReactionText: Who are you? What are you doing on my island?$2#$b# Oh... Honestly, I didn't think anyone would take that letter seriously, I send it to people every year to fuck with them and they usually ignore me.#$b# Since you're here and want the item, you have to do some small tasks for me first.

Quests.Name: sten_slimes
Quests.Title: Get soapstone
Kill Slimes In Sten's House
Quests.Description: Sten wants you to kill the slimes in his house in order to rescue his mods drive.
Quests.ReactionText: Hey! This has some scratches on it… Did you accidentally hit my drive when killing the slimes? Watch where you wave your sword around, dude!$2 Why don’t you complete some more errands for me and I’ll think about whether I feel like telling you where the item is then.$0

Quests.Name: sten_amethyst
Quests.Title: Bring Sten an Amethyst
Quests.Objective: Sten wants an amethyst, bring him one.
Quests.ReactionText: Hmmm...$b This shit SUCKS!$2 Why the fuck does Abigail eat these?! I wanted to know why she likes eating them so much, but I regret even asking for this. I’d say thanks, but I think I just broke my tooth. Well I don’t feel particularly happy, which doesn’t bode well for you. I’m feeling kind though,  so I’ll let you make it up to me by giving you another quest.

Quests.Name: sten_fiber
Quests.Title: Retrieve 'Fiber'
Quests.Description: Sten wants fiber for some reason. Might as well give it to him.
Quests.ReactionText: Wait, did you actually bring me fiber? #$b# You know when I said I wanted ‘fiber’, I obviously meant I wanted you to bring me weed, not weeds you found in your backyard! I thought the air quotations gave it away.$3

Quests.Name: sten_underpants
Quests.Title: Mayor Lewis' 'Shorts'
Quests.ReactionText: You know I didn’t think you had the guts to actually do that to the mayor but you proved me wrong.$1

Quests.Name: sten_mead
Quests.Title: Skyrim Mead
Quests.Description: Sten is very obsessed with Skyrim, and now he wants mead.
Quests.ReactionText: What took you so long just to get me alcohol? #$b# You know what, it doesn’t matter. I'm gonna spend the whole day drinking, while playing some more Skyrim. #$b# DO NOT and I mean DO NOT come back to bother me until I'm done with the whole game.$2

Quests.Name: getItemFromSten
Quests.Title: Talk to Sten Tomorrow
Quests.Objective: Talk to Sten tomorrow to get the next quest.
Quests.ReactionText: Well, as nice as the free labor is, I’m starting to get bored of you. #$b# I want to go back to installing Skyrim mods, so let’s do a trade: I’ll give you the item and you leave me the fuck alone.

OfferDetails.Text: Hello @.^I heard some rumors that there is an interesting item on a mysterious island nearby. I’ve arranged transportation for you on the beach. I would’ve gone to get the item myself, but I heard that there is a scary man that lives on the island.^  -Anonymous

OfferDetails.DialogueText: First task I want you to do is to save my precious Skyrim mods drive from the slimes in my house. Don't look at me like that. I know what you're thinking.#$b#`Sten, do you not clean your house? I’ve heard slimes only live in cave-like or gross environments.`#$b#But that’s none of your concern. Just save the drive and I’ll think about giving you the item.
Now for the second task. Well...#$b#I want one amethyst. No, I’m not joking. Just bring it to me.
Oh you’re here. I need you to get me some... 'fiber'. Yeah let’s go with that. 10 fiber.
I want you to steal Mayor Lewis's underpants. #$b# No, I’m not a pervert. #$b# I don’t want them for anything weird, I just think it’ll piss him off and that sounds really funny.
Oh, it’s you again... #$b# Is there no one else that you can go bother?#$b#$2 Since you’re here I want you to do another errand for me. Get Mead for me.
